title: Jardiniere, 1770s
markings: Signed under glaze in sepia on base.
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Fluted lower body; mask "handles" with festoons below. Decoration in polychrome with ochre, green and blue allegorical scenes in rococo cartouches.

tombstone.epitaph: Jardiniere, 1770s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-5.
